results.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
results.creator_credit: Kevin Feige, Charles Wood, Joss Whedon, Alexandra Byrne, Leonard F.W. Green and Marvel Studios
results.brief_description: When Tony Stark tries to jumpstart a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry and Earth’s Mightiest Heroes are put to the ultimate test.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Kevin Feige, Charles Wood, Joss Whedon, Alexandra Byrne, Leonard F.W. Green and Marvel Studios
results.description: When Tony Stark tries to jumpstart a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry and Earth’s Mightiest Heroes are put to the ultimate test as the fate of the planet hangs in the balance. As the villainous Ultron emerges, it is up to The Avengers to stop him from enacting his terrible plans, and soon uneasy alliances and unexpected action pave the way for an epic and unique global adventure.
description_for_label: When Tony Stark tries to jumpstart a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry and Earth’s Mightiest Heroes are put to the ultimate test as the fate of the planet hangs in the balance. As the villainous Ultron emerges, it is up to The Avengers to stop him from enacting his terrible plans, and soon uneasy alliances and unexpected action pave the way for an epic and unique global adventure.

results.title: Avatar
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2009
results.brief_description: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2009
results.description: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

results.title: Australian Walkabout
results.brief_description: Australian Walkabout is a TV series made for the ABC and BBC by director Charles Chauvel. It was the last project completed by Chauvel prior to his death.
results.description: Australian Walkabout is a TV series made for the ABC and BBC by director Charles Chauvel. It was the last project completed by Chauvel prior to his death.

results.title: Austin Powers in Goldmember
results.brief_description: The world’s most shagadelic spy continues his fight against Dr. Evil. This time, the diabolical doctor and his clone, Mini-Me, team up with a new foe — ‘70s kingpin Goldmember. While pursuing the team of villains to stop them from world domination, Austin gets help from his dad and an old girlfriend.
results.description: The world’s most shagadelic spy continues his fight against Dr. Evil. This time, the diabolical doctor and his clone, Mini-Me, team up with a new foe — ‘70s kingpin Goldmember. While pursuing the team of villains to stop them from world domination, Austin gets help from his dad and an old girlfriend.

results.title: Attenberg
results.brief_description: Marina, 23, is growing up with her architect father by the sea. Finding the human species strange and repellent, she keeps her distance, instead observing life through the songs of Suicide, David Attenborough documentaries, and the sexual-education lessons she receives from her only friend, Bella.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs and Yorgos Lanthimos
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

results.description: Marina, 23, is growing up with her architect father in a prototype factory town by the sea. Finding the human species strange and repellent, she keeps her distance. Instead she chooses to observe it through the songs of Suicide, the mammal documentaries of Sir David Attenborough, and the sexual-education lessons she receives from her only friend, Bella. A stranger comes to town and challenges her to a foosball duel, on her own table. Her father meanwhile ritualistically prepares for his exit from the 20th century, which he considers to be “overrated.” Caught between the two men and her collaborator, Bella, Marina investigates the wondrous mystery of the human fauna.
description_for_label: Marina, 23, is growing up with her architect father in a prototype factory town by the sea. Finding the human species strange and repellent, she keeps her distance. Instead she chooses to observe it through the songs of Suicide, the mammal documentaries of Sir David Attenborough, and the sexual-education lessons she receives from her only friend, Bella. A stranger comes to town and challenges her to a foosball duel, on her own table. Her father meanwhile ritualistically prepares for his exit from the 20th century, which he considers to be “overrated.” Caught between the two men and her collaborator, Bella, Marina investigates the wondrous mystery of the human fauna.

creators_other.name: MEDIA Programme of the European Union

results.title: Attack Force Z
results.brief_description: Tim Burstall directs then-up-and-comers Mel Gibson and Sam Neill in this action-packed Cannes Film Festival selection about the grim realities of World War II, a gritty drama based on actual events.

constellations_other.name: Australia and WW2
constellations_other.description: A constellation exploring representations of Australians during World War 2.

results.description: Tim Burstall directs then-up-and-comers Mel Gibson and Sam Neill in this action-packed Cannes Film Festival selection about the grim realities of World War II, a gritty drama based on actual events. Sent to rescue survivors from the site of a plane crash in the South Pacific, Capt. P.G. Kelly (Gibson) and his elite squad of Australian commandos must keep tabs on a defecting Japanese official who could hold the secret to peace.
description_for_label: Tim Burstall directs then-up-and-comers Mel Gibson and Sam Neill in this action-packed Cannes Film Festival selection about the grim realities of World War II, a gritty drama based on actual events. Sent to rescue survivors from the site of a plane crash in the South Pacific, Capt. P.G. Kelly (Gibson) and his elite squad of Australian commandos must keep tabs on a defecting Japanese official who could hold the secret to peace.

results.title: Atonement
results.creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Relativity Media, Working Title Films, StudioCanal, Jacqueline Durran, Sarah Greenwood, Joe Wright, Paul Webster, Christopher Hampton, Eric Fellner and Tim Bevan
results.headline_credit: France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2007
results.brief_description: As a 13-year-old, fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister’s lover of a crime he did not commit.

constellations_other.name: The war effort on film
constellations_other.description: Newsreel and documentaries were used as propaganda for the war effort by all sides during WWII, many of them made by major film studios, directors and actors.

results.title: Astro Boy
results.brief_description: In the year 2000, Dr. Boyton creates a super-robot in his deceased son’s image. He calls the robot Astro Boy. Astro Boy can swim oceans, leap over mountains, even fly into space on his own power. However, Astro Boy can’t replace his son.

constellations_other.name: 9.5mm Pathe-Baby and parents behaving badly
constellations_other.description: A look at the link between the Pathé-Baby system and animation, as well as the relationship between cinematic parents and their children.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs, influence and inspiration
constellations_other.description: A tradition of influence and inspiration beginning with Eisenstein.

results.description:
In the year 2000, Dr. Boyton creates a super-robot in his deceased son’s image. He calls the robot Astro Boy. Astro Boy can swim oceans, leap over mountains, even fly into space on his own power. However, Astro Boy can’t replace his son. Dr. Boyton becomes dissatisfied with the boy robot and disowns him.

Astro Boy is befriended by Dr. Packadermus J. Elefun of the Institute of Science, who guides him through his adventures. Endowed with super strength, rocket-powered flight, a selfless heart and a kind demeanor, Astro Boy fights a never-ending crusade against the forces of evil!
description_for_label:
In the year 2000, Dr. Boyton creates a super-robot in his deceased son’s image. He calls the robot Astro Boy. Astro Boy can swim oceans, leap over mountains, even fly into space on his own power. However, Astro Boy can’t replace his son. Dr. Boyton becomes dissatisfied with the boy robot and disowns him.

Astro Boy is befriended by Dr. Packadermus J. Elefun of the Institute of Science, who guides him through his adventures. Endowed with super strength, rocket-powered flight, a selfless heart and a kind demeanor, Astro Boy fights a never-ending crusade against the forces of evil!

results.title: Assassins
results.brief_description: In the criminal justice system, where convictions are made based on arguments being convincing beyond a reasonable doubt, editing factual media has the ability to create doubt, shedding new light on closed cases and can even right the wrongs of the justice system.

constellations_primary.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_primary.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.

constellations_primary.name: Reasonable doubt
constellations_primary.description: Factual media has the power to reframe information and put forth new, persuasive arguments.  For the criminal justice system, where convictions are made based on arguments being convincing beyond a reasonable doubt, True Crime media has the ability to create doubt, right the wrongs of the justice system, and shed new light on closed cases.

results.description: In 2017, the estranged half-brother of North Korean leader Kim Jong-un was murdered in a crowded Malaysian airport. Poisoned in broad daylight, Kim Jong-nam’s death captured the world’s attention. It wasn’t just the victim’s high profile that had news desks in a flurry but the two unassuming young women at the centre of the attack. Wild stories emerged of them being highly trained North Korean spies equipped with poison lipstick while others suggested a bizarre tale of a video prank gone wrong.
description_for_label: In 2017, the estranged half-brother of North Korean leader Kim Jong-un was murdered in a crowded Malaysian airport. Poisoned in broad daylight, Kim Jong-nam’s death captured the world’s attention. It wasn’t just the victim’s high profile that had news desks in a flurry but the two unassuming young women at the centre of the attack. Wild stories emerged of them being highly trained North Korean spies equipped with poison lipstick while others suggested a bizarre tale of a video prank gone wrong.

results.title: Assassin's Creed
results.headline_credit: France, Hong Kong, Malta, Taiwan, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016
results.brief_description: Through unlocked genetic memories that allow him to relive the adventures of his ancestor in 15th century Spain, Callum Lynch discovers he’s a descendant of the secret ‘Assassins’ society. After gaining incredible knowledge and skills, he is now poised to take on the oppressive Knights Templar in the present day.

constellations_other.name: The Australian industry
constellations_other.description: Though our local industry is small, our impact is huge!

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.
